original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The results of the 2022 GCE Ordinary Level Examination were released during the early hours of Friday (01).
The Department of Examinations said the results can be viewed by visiting the official website via www.doenets.lk or www.results.exams.gov.lk.
Applications for recorrection can be submitted from the 4th to the 18th of December.

Appeals related to 2022/2023 academic year to be accepted until 30th December
